mapper.sql: ssp.RID, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.IP, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.MEMO, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, ssp.RECORDSTATE, ssp.KEYWORDS, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.DETIAL_COUNT, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.ENFORCE_TIME, ssp.ENFORCE_USER, ssp.RECTIFY_COUNT, ssp.DETAIL_RID, ssp.URL, ssp.PRIORITY, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME, use.USERNAME

ssp.RID, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.IP, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.MEMO, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, ssp.RECORDSTATE, ssp.KEYWORDS, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.DETIAL_COUNT, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.ENFORCE_TIME, ssp.ENFORCE_USER, ssp.RECTIFY_COUNT, ssp.DETAIL_RID, ssp.URL, ssp.PRIORITY, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME, use.USERNAME

RID as EVENT_MAINRID, EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, EVENT_TYPE1, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, DOMAIN_NAME, CC_DOMAIN, IP, ATTACK_IP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, MEMO, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, KEYWORDS, SNAPSHOP, DETIAL_COUNT, ENFORCE_COUNT, ENFORCE_TIME, ENFORCE_USER, RECTIFY_COUNT, PRIORITY, URL
mapper.select: select RECTIFY_STATE,CREATTIME,ENFORCE_COUNT,THREAT_TYPE4,KEYWORDS,IS_FORCE_CLOSE,PRIORITY,THREAT_LEVEL,THREAT_TYPE1,THREAT_TYPE2 ,FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RECORDSTATE='0' and RID=#{RID}
select RID as EVENT_RID,MODIFIEDTIME,ACCESS_ID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RECORDSTATE = '0' and RECTIFY_STATE = '020' and IS_FORCE_CLOSE = '2'
select RID, MAIN_RID, OCCUR_TIME from smms_pending_event where MAIN_RID = #{EVENT_RID} AND #{MODIFIEDTIME} < OCCUR_TIME
select from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RID=#{EVENT_RID}
select EVENT_TYPE1,THREAT_TYPE1,THREAT_TYPE4 from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RID=#{RID}
select count(RID) as NO_CASE from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and (WEB_CASE_RID is null or WEB_CASE_RID='')
select count(MODIFIEDTIME) as MONTH_EVENT from smms_event_main where substring(MODIFIEDTIME,1,7)=substring(to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),1,7) and RECORDSTATE='0'

select count(RECTIFY_STATE) as MONTH_DEALT from smms_event_main where substring(MODIFIEDTIME,1,7)=substring(to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),1,7) and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and RECORDSTATE='0'

select count(RECTIFY_STATE) as MONTH_NOT_DEAL from smms_event_main where substring(MODIFIEDTIME,1,7)=substring(to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),1,7) and RECTIFY_STATE ='000' and RECTIFY_STATE !='' and RECTIFY_STATE is not null and RECORDSTATE='0'

select count(IS_FORCE_CLOSE) as CLOSED_COUNT from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and RECORDSTATE='0'
select count(IS_FORCE_CLOSE) as NEED_CLOSE_COUNT from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and RECTIFY_STATE ='000' and RECTIFY_STATE !='' and RECTIFY_STATE is not null and RECORDSTATE='0'

select count(IS_FORCE_CLOSE) as RECTIFY_COUNT from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and RECORDSTATE='0'
select count(IS_FORCE_CLOSE) as NEED_RECTIFY_COUNT from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and RECTIFY_STATE ='000' and RECTIFY_STATE !='' and RECTIFY_STATE is not null and RECORDSTATE='0'

select count(threat_type4) as COUNT_THREAT_TYPE4_ALL from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%010%' or threat_type4 like '%020%' or threat_type4 like '%030%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and threat_type4!='' and threat_type4 is not null
select count(threat_type4) as KEY_010 from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%010%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and threat_type4!='' and threat_type4 is not null
select count(threat_type4) as KEY_020 from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%020%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!=''
select count(threat_type4) as KEY_030 from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%030%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!=''

select count(threat_type4) as COUNT_THREAT_TYPE4_ALL from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%040%' or threat_type4 like '%050%' or threat_type4 like '%060%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!=''
select count(threat_type4) as KEY_040 from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%040%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!=''
select count(threat_type4) as KEY_050 from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%050%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!=''
select count(threat_type4) as KEY_060 from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%060%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!=''

select MAX(idc.idc_short_name) AS IDC_NAME,main.access_id as IDC_ID,main.threat_type1,count(main.threat_type1) as COUNT_THREAT_TYPE1 from smms_event_main main LEFT JOIN smms_idc_info idc ON idc.idc_id = main.access_id where main.access_id !='' and main.access_id is not null and main.threat_type1!='99' and main.threat_type1!='' and main.RECORDSTATE='0' GROUP BY main.threat_type1,main.access_id ORDER BY main.access_id DESC

select MAX(idc.idc_short_name) AS IDC_NAME,main.access_id as IDC_ID,main.event_type1,count(main.event_type1) as COUNT_EVENT_TYPE1 from smms_event_main main LEFT JOIN smms_idc_info idc ON idc.idc_id = main.access_id where main.access_id !='' and main.access_id is not null and main.event_type1 !='' and main.event_type1 is not null and main.RECORDSTATE='0' and (main.event_type1 = 'vpn' or main.event_type1='vpno' or main.event_type1='proxy') GROUP BY main.event_type1,main.access_id ORDER BY main.access_id DESC

select MAX(idc.idc_short_name) AS IDC_NAME,main.access_id as IDC_ID,main.threat_type1,count(main.threat_type1) as COUNT_THREAT_TYPE1 from smms_event_main main LEFT JOIN smms_idc_info idc ON idc.idc_id = main.access_id where main.access_id !='' and main.access_id is not null and main.threat_type1!='99' and main.threat_type1!='' and main.RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE !='888' and RECTIFY_STATE !='' and RECTIFY_STATE is not null GROUP BY main.threat_type1,main.access_id ORDER BY main.access_id DESC

select MAX(idc.idc_short_name) AS IDC_NAME,main.access_id as IDC_ID,main.event_type1,count(main.event_type1) as COUNT_EVENT_TYPE1 from smms_event_main main LEFT JOIN smms_idc_info idc ON idc.idc_id = main.access_id where main.access_id !='' and main.access_id is not null and main.event_type1 !='' and main.event_type1 is not null and main.RECORDSTATE='0' and (main.event_type1 = 'vpn' or main.event_type1='vpno' or main.event_type1='proxy') and RECTIFY_STATE !='888' and RECTIFY_STATE !='' and RECTIFY_STATE is not null GROUP BY main.event_type1,main.access_id ORDER BY main.access_id DESC

select threat_type2 as EVENT_NAME,count(threat_type2) as EVENT_COUNT from smms_event_main where threat_type2!='' and threat_type2 is not null and RECORDSTATE='0' GROUP BY threat_type2 ORDER BY count(threat_type2) DESC LIMIT 10

select threat_type2 as EVENT_NAME,count(threat_type2) as EVENT_COUNT from smms_event_main where threat_type2!='' and threat_type2 is not null and RECTIFY_STATE !='888' and RECTIFY_STATE !='' and RECTIFY_STATE is not null and RECORDSTATE='0' GROUP BY threat_type2 ORDER BY count(threat_type2) DESC LIMIT 10
select count(*) as AQSJZS from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!=''
select count(*) as WCLSJS from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' and RECTIFY_STATE ='000'
select count(*) as EVEENT_TOTAL_YCL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' and RECTIFY_STATE !='000'
select count(*) as COUNT_NY,substring(creattime,1,7) as NY from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' group by substring(creattime,1,7)

select sse.DOMAIN_NAME as DOMAIN_NAME, sse.room_name as ROOM_NAME, sii.idc_short_name as IDC_NAME, ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as WEBSITE_NAME, case WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='000' then '未处理' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='010' then '已下发' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='888' then '已处理' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='020' then '已处理' else RECTIFY_STATE end as RECTIFY_STATE from smms_event_main as sse left join smms_idc_info as sii on sse.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on sse.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID where (threat_type4 like '%040%' or threat_type4 like '%050%' OR threat_type4 like '%060%' ) and sse.RECORDSTATE='0' and WEB_CASE_RID is not null and WEB_CASE_RID!='' ${CONDITION}

select sse.DOMAIN_NAME as DOMAIN_NAME, sse.room_name as ROOM_NAME, sii.idc_short_name as IDC_NAME, ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as WEBSITE_NAME, case WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='000' then '未处理' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='010' then '已下发' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='888' then '已处理' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='020' then '已处理' else RECTIFY_STATE end as RECTIFY_STATE from smms_event_main as sse left join smms_idc_info as sii on sse.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on sse.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID where (threat_type4 like '%020%' or threat_type4 like '%030%'
) and sse.RECORDSTATE='0' and WEB_CASE_RID is not null and WEB_CASE_RID!='' ${CONDITION}

select sse.DOMAIN_NAME as DOMAIN_NAME, sse.room_name as ROOM_NAME, sii.idc_short_name as IDC_NAME, ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as WEBSITE_NAME, case WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='000' then '未处理' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='010' then '已下发' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='888' then '已处理' WHEN sse.RECTIFY_STATE ='020' then '已处理' else RECTIFY_STATE end as RECTIFY_STATE from smms_event_main as sse left join smms_idc_info as sii on sse.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on sse.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID where threat_type4 like '%010%' and sse.RECORDSTATE='0' and WEB_CASE_RID is not null and WEB_CASE_RID!='' ${CONDITION}
select DETAIL_RID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RID=#{RID}

select ssp.url as URL, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM as CLOSE_TERM, ssp.rid as EVENT_ID, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT as ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.DETAIL_RID as DETAIL_RID, case when ssp.DOMAIN_NAME is null or ssp.DOMAIN_NAME='' then ip ELSE ssp.DOMAIN_NAME end as DOMAIN,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE
from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid
ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' and ssp.ACCESS_ID !='' and ssp.ACCESS_ID is not null
${RIDCONDITION}

select ssp.rid as EVENT_ID, ssp.url as URL, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT as ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.DETAIL_RID as DETAIL_RID, case when ssp.DOMAIN_NAME is null or ssp.DOMAIN_NAME='' then ip ELSE ssp.DOMAIN_NAME end as DOMAIN,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST as RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid
ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' and ssp.ACCESS_ID !='' and ssp.ACCESS_ID is not null
${RIDCONDITION}

select ssp.rid as EVENT_ID, ssp.url as URL, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT as ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.DETAIL_RID as DETAIL_RID, case when ssp.DOMAIN_NAME is null or ssp.DOMAIN_NAME='' then ip ELSE ssp.DOMAIN_NAME end as DOMAIN,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST as RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' and ssp.ACCESS_ID !='' and ssp.ACCESS_ID is not null order by ssp.access_id asc

select ssp.url as URL, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM as CLOSE_TERM, ssp.rid as EVENT_ID, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT as ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.DETAIL_RID as DETAIL_RID, case when ssp.DOMAIN_NAME is null or ssp.DOMAIN_NAME='' then ip ELSE ssp.DOMAIN_NAME end as DOMAIN,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE
from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' and ssp.ACCESS_ID !='' and ssp.ACCESS_ID is not null order by ssp.access_id asc

select ssi.ACCESS_IP as IP, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT as ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.DETAIL_RID as DETAIL_RID, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME as DOMAIN from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid left join smms_web_case_ip as ssi on swc.rid=ssi.case_rid where ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' order by ssp.access_id asc
select MAPPING_MODE from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'

SELECT sii.rid as SIIRID, sii.IDC_NAME as IDC_NAME, ssr.rid as SSRRID, ssr.ROOM_NAME as ROOM_NAME, ssr.ROOM_IDX as ROOM_IDX, ssr.ROOM_ADDRESS as ROOM_ADDRESS FROM
smms_room_info as ssr left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssr.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssr.ACCESS_ID=#{ACCESS_ID} and ssr.ROOM_IDX=#{ROOM_IDX} and ssr.RECORDSTATE='0'
mapper.update: update SMMS_EVENT_MAIN set RECTIFY_MEASURE=#{RECTIFY_MEASURE}, RECTIFY_STATE=#{RECTIFY_STATE}, FEEDBACK_TIME=#{FEEDBACK_TIME}, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP=#{FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP}, ENFORCE_COUNT=ENFORCE_COUNT+1, MODIFIEDTIME=#{MODIFIEDTIME} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID, count(*) as WBA from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (WEB_CASE_RID is null or WEB_CASE_RID='') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SK from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%010%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SZ from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%020%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SW from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%030%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SH from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%040%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SD from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%050%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SDU from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%060%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1 from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%010%' or threat_type4 like '%020%' or threat_type4 like '%030%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2 from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%040%' or threat_type4 like '%050%' or threat_type4 like '%060%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as FQDL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and EVENT_TYPE1='vpno' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as ZSRQ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='01' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as HCML from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='03' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as HKKZ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='02' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as NBGJ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='04' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as WBA_CLZ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (WEB_CASE_RID is null or WEB_CASE_RID='') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SK_CLZ from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%010%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SZ_CLZ from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%020%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SW_CLZ from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%030%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SH_CLZ from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%040%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SD_CLZ from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%050%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SDU_CLZ from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%060%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_CLZ from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%010%' or threat_type4 like '%020%' or threat_type4 like '%030%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and (WEB_CASE_RID is null or WEB_CASE_RID='') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_CLZ from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%040%' or threat_type4 like '%050%' or threat_type4 like '%060%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as FQDL_CLZ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and EVENT_TYPE1='vpno' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as ZSRQ_CLZ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='01' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as HCML_CLZ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='03' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as HKKZ_CLZ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='02' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as NBGJ_CLZ from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='04' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as WBA_YCL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (WEB_CASE_RID is null or WEB_CASE_RID='') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SK_YCL from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%010%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SZ_YCL from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%020%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_SW_YCL from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%030%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SH_YCL from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%040%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SD_YCL from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%050%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_SDU_YCL from smms_event_main where threat_type4 like '%060%' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS1_YCL from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%010%' or threat_type4 like '%020%' or threat_type4 like '%030%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as SS2_YCL from smms_event_main where (threat_type4 like '%040%' or threat_type4 like '%050%' or threat_type4 like '%060%' ) and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and (threat_type4!='' or threat_type4 is not null) and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as FQDL_YCL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and EVENT_TYPE1='vpno' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as ZSRQ_YCL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='01' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as HCML_YCL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='03' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as HKKZ_YCL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='02' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,count(*) as NBGJ_YCL from smms_event_main where RECORDSTATE='0' and THREAT_TYPE1='04' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='899' or RECTIFY_STATE='020' or RECTIFY_STATE='030' or RECTIFY_STATE='900') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select count(*) as GTZ,ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID ,ROOM_IDX from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999' or RECTIFY_STATE='005') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ,ROOM_IDX ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select count(*) as SQHF,ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID ,ROOM_IDX from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='030' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ,ROOM_IDX ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select count(*) as DZG,ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,ROOM_IDX from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ,ROOM_IDX ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select count(*) as ZGZ,ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,ROOM_IDX from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='010' or RECTIFY_STATE='999') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ,ROOM_IDX ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select count(*) as YZG,ACCESS_ID as IDC_ID,ROOM_IDX from smms_event_main where IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and RECORDSTATE='0' and (RECTIFY_STATE='888' or RECTIFY_STATE='020') and ACCESS_ID is not null and ACCESS_ID!='' GROUP BY ACCESS_ID ,ROOM_IDX ORDER BY ACCESS_ID DESC

select sse.THREAT_TYPE2 as THREAT_TYPE2, sse.room_name as ROOM_NAME, sii.idc_short_name as IDC_NAME, IP, case WHEN sse.PRIORITY='3' then '已失陷' else RECTIFY_STATE end as RECTIFY_STATE from smms_event_main as sse left join smms_idc_info as sii on sse.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID
where PRIORITY='3' and sse.RECORDSTATE='0' and sse.ACCESS_ID is not null and sse.ACCESS_ID !='' ORDER BY sse.creattime DESC

select ssp.IP as ip, ssp.ATTACK_IP as ATTACK_IP, sii.idc_short_name as IDC_NAME, ssp.ROOM_NAME as room_name, crc1.CRC_VALUE as event_type2
from smms_event_main as sse
left join SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp on sse.DETAIL_RID=ssp.rid left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join smms_crc_mapting as crc1 on ssp.EVENT_TYPE2 = crc1.CRC_KEY where ssp.recordstate ='0' and ssp.LOG_TABLENAME='SMMS_AC_APP_VPN'
and (crc1.CRC_TYPE='a' or crc1.CRC_TYPE ='r' or crc1.CRC_TYPE ='t')
ORDER BY ssp.CREATTIME DESC
mapper.update: update SMMS_EVENT_MAIN set IS_WHITE_LIST='1' where RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: select ,sii.IDC_NAME as TRANS_IDC_ID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left join S_USER as use on ssp.ENFORCE_USER=use.USERID left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssp.RID = #{RID}

select ssp.RID, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.IP, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.MEMO, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, ssp.RECORDSTATE, ssp.KEYWORDS, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.DETIAL_COUNT, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.URL, ssp.PRIORITY from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN ssp where ssp.RID = #{EVENT_MAINRID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_EVENT_MAIN set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: select from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssp.RID = #{RID}
select ACCESS_ID ,case when DOMAIN_NAME is null or DOMAIN_NAME='' then ip ELSE DOMAIN_NAME end as DOMAIN_NAME,ENFORCE_COUNT from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RID = #{RID}
select ACCESS_ID,ENFORCE_COUNT from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RID = #{RID}

select IP,URL,RID as EVENT_RID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN
${CONDITION}

select ssp.CLIENTNAME as clientname, ssp.REPORT_CITY as report_city, ssp.REPORT_TIME as report_time, ssp.OCCUR_TIME as occur_time, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as threat_level, ssp.THREAT_NAME as threat_name, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 as threat_type2, ssp.IP as ip, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME as domain_name, ssp.URL as url, ssp.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssp.ROOM_NAME as room_name, ssp.ROOM_IDX as room_idx, ssp.SNAPSHOP as snapshop, ssp.LOG_RID as log_rid, ssp.LOG_TABLENAME as log_tablename, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME as modifiedtime, ssp.CREATTIME as creattime, ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as web_case_name, ssp.PRIORITY as priority from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID
ssp.recordstate ='0' and ssp.ip=#{IP} and ssp.access_id=#{ACCESS_ID} and ssp.log_tablename ='SMMS_AF_LOG' and ssp.WEB_CASE_RID is not null and ssp.WEB_CASE_RID != '' and ssp.OCCUR_TIME >= #{STARTTIME} and ssp.OCCUR_TIME <= #{ENDTIME} ORDER BY ssp.OCCUR_TIME DESC LIMIT #{LIMIT} OFFSET #{OFFSET}

select count(*) from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID
ssp.recordstate ='0' and ssp.ip=#{IP} and ssp.access_id=#{ACCESS_ID} and ssp.log_tablename ='SMMS_AF_LOG' and ssp.WEB_CASE_RID is not null and ssp.WEB_CASE_RID != '' and ssp.OCCUR_TIME >= #{STARTTIME} and ssp.OCCUR_TIME <= #{ENDTIME}

select ssp.CLIENTNAME as clientname, ssp.REPORT_CITY as report_city, ssp.REPORT_TIME as report_time, ssp.OCCUR_TIME as occur_time, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as threat_level, ssp.THREAT_NAME as threat_name, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 as threat_type2, ssp.IP as ip, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME as domain_name, ssp.URL as url, ssp.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssp.ROOM_NAME as room_name, ssp.ROOM_IDX as room_idx, ssp.SNAPSHOP as snapshop, ssp.LOG_RID as log_rid, ssp.LOG_TABLENAME as log_tablename, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME as modifiedtime, ssp.CREATTIME as creattime, ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as web_case_name, ssp.PRIORITY as priority from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID
ssp.recordstate ='0' and ssp.ip=#{IP} and ssp.access_id=#{ACCESS_ID} and ssp.log_tablename ='SMMS_AF_LOG' and (ssp.WEB_CASE_RID is null or ssp.WEB_CASE_RID = '') and ssp.OCCUR_TIME >= #{STARTTIME} and ssp.OCCUR_TIME <= #{ENDTIME} ORDER BY ssp.OCCUR_TIME DESC LIMIT #{LIMIT} OFFSET #{OFFSET}

select count(*) from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID
ssp.recordstate ='0' and ssp.ip=#{IP} and ssp.access_id=#{ACCESS_ID} and ssp.log_tablename ='SMMS_AF_LOG' and (ssp.WEB_CASE_RID is null or ssp.WEB_CASE_RID = '') and ssp.OCCUR_TIME >= #{STARTTIME} and ssp.OCCUR_TIME <= #{ENDTIME}
mapper.insert:
insert into SMMS_EVENT_MAIN (
EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, EVENT_TYPE1, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, DOMAIN_NAME, CC_DOMAIN, IP, ATTACK_IP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, MEMO, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, SNAPSHOP, KEYWORDS, URL, DETIAL_COUNT, ENFORCE_COUNT, ENFORCE_TIME, ENFORCE_USER, RECTIFY_COUNT, PRIORITY, DETAIL_RID, RID ) values (
#{EVENT_SOURCE}, #{CLIENTNAME}, #{REPORT_CITY}, #{EVENT_TYPE1}, #{THREAT_LEVEL},1, #{THREAT_NAME},999, #{THREAT_TYPE1},99, #{THREAT_TYPE2}, #{THREAT_TYPE3}, #{THREAT_TYPE4}, #{ACCESS_ID}, #{ROOM_NAME}, #{ROOM_IDX}, #{DOMAIN_NAME}, #{CC_DOMAIN}, #{IP}, #{ATTACK_IP}, #{SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{IS_FORCE_CLOSE},2, #{IS_WHITE_LIST},2, #{FORCE_CLOSE_DESC}, #{RECTIFY_TERM}, #{CLOSE_TERM}, #{SEND_TIME}, #{SEND_TIMESTAMP}, #{RECTIFY_STATE}, #{RECTIFY_MEASURE}, #{FEEDBACK_TIME}, #{FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP}, #{WEB_CASE_RID}, #{MAPPING_MODE}, #{MEMO}, #{CREATTIME}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE}, #{SNAPSHOP}, #{KEYWORDS}, #{URL}, #{DETIAL_COUNT}, #{ENFORCE_COUNT}, #{ENFORCE_TIME}, #{ENFORCE_USER}, #{RECTIFY_COUNT}, #{PRIORITY}, #{DETAIL_RID}, #{RID})
